DOC.brief_summary: The goal study compare effect aquatic exercise ( AEG ) aquatic exercise plus aerobic training ( deep-water running ) ( AEDWRG ) functional status pain patient specific chronic low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Aquatic Exercises Patients With Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: In general , population least one episode low back pain lifetime , recurrence case . Several treatment propose patient evidence still clear effectiveness aquatic exercise compare modality exercise water . This study randomize control trial follow Consort-Statement principle . The subject , age 20 50 year , sign informed consent randomly allocate one group treatment : aquatic exercise ( AEG ) aquatic exercise associate deep-water running ( AEDWRG ) . The duration protocol set 12 week , 3x-week .
DOC.criteria: Exclusive diagnosis chronic low back pain ( 12 week ) Central nervous system disease Pregnant Fear water
